frameDefinitions: A Container  is in a state of fullness/emptiness with respect to some Contents.
Through use, a Resource is diminished in quality or quantity (up to complete attrition) such that it becomes less capable of sustaining future use.
A Person takes leave from his or her routine Activity (such as work or school) for a Duration of time.
The Quantity of a Collection occurring in a Place has a particular Measure, which is related to the amount generally needed.
This frame covers words for Body_part(s) (BP) belonging to a Possessor (Poss), which may be characterized by a Descriptor (Desc).
This frame has to do with the repetition (and especially the frequency of repetition) of an event.
frameExamples: John carried a bucket <t>full</t> of water.
My entire life savings is <t>depleted</t> due to university and medical bills.
The claimant should then submit medical certificates for the duration of their <t>absence</t> from work.INI
There is evidence that volatile materials have always been <t>scarce</t> on the Moon .
He had to brace his right <t><fex name='Body_part'>arm</fex></t> against his leg in order to fight the roll.
China will have to face a high <t>frequency</t> of sand storms in the years to come.
listRoleDefinitions: <fen>Container</fen> is used for the entity whose fullness is being described.
<fen>Contents</fen> is used for the stuff that is present/absent in the <fen>Container</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Container</fen> is full.
The <fen>Resource</fen> is a physical entity or an ability to perform work that was used in an earlier process, typically in pursuit of a goal.
The person who is absent from his or her <fen>Activity</fen> for a <fen>Duration</fen> of time.
This role describes the activity or responsiblilities from which the <fen>Person</fen> is taking a temporary leave.
The amount of time the <fen>Person</fen> is absent from his or her <fen>Activity</fen>.  This can also be expressed as a description of a duration, as shown below:
The time at which the leave occurs.
The <fen>Collection</fen> whose <fen>Quantity</fen> is under consideration.
The feature of an <fen>Collection</fen> which is under discussion. This role is incorporated by all the lexical units in this frame.
The location in which the <fen>Collection</fen> occurs.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Collection</fen> is in the state of having  a particular <fen>Measure</fen> for the <fen>Quantity</fen>.
This Frame Element denotes the <fen>Possessor</fen> of the <fen>Body_part</fen>.
This Frame Element  is the <fen>Body_part</fen>.
This role is used for any (bounded) <fen>Event</fen> whose frequency or iteration is described.
The extent to which the actually observed rate of occurrence of the <fen>Event</fen> or <fen>Salient_entity</fen> differs from the expected rate.
The <fen>Interval</fen> is a noun modified by the target word. The target word specifies the frequency of the <fen>Interval</fen> .
The <fen>Time_span</fen> is the length of time of the <fen>Interval</fen>. This role is incorporated by most of the lexical units in this frame.
The number of times per unit of real or scanning time that an <fen>Event</fen> or <fen>Salient_entity</fen> is encountered.
An entity which the implicit cognizer encounters with the specified frequency.
The frequency feature of the <fen>Event</fen> or <fen>Salient_entity</fen> that is under discussion. All the lexical units in this frame incorporate this frame element.
The Time when the Event has a particular frequency.
listRoleExamples: John carried an empty <fex>bucket</fex>.
The bucket is  full <fex>of water</fex>.
<fex>The battery</fex> is slightly worn out
During his <fex>wife's</fex> absence, Linkworth and his mother had another violent argument.
Such conditions would be likely to lead to absence <fex>from work</fex>.
Dissuaded from resigning, Macmillan took <fex>extended</fex> leave rather than restrain his public utterances.
Columbus took leave of the known world <fex>on 6 September 1492</fex>.
Relax, <fex>oil supplies</fex> are plentiful.
The majority of specimens were poorly represented, as judged by the small size of mature plants, the immaturity of thalli or scarceness <fex>in occurrence</fex>.
Northern Pike are plentiful <fex>in Perrault Lake</fex>.
<fex>These days</fex> food is plentiful and easy to get and physical activity is no longer a part of daily life.
<fex>Kim's</fex> arm is broken.
Kim's <fex>arm</fex> is broken.
The country has been struck by frequent <fex>economic crises</fex>.
The Crested Lark (Galerida cristata) is  <fex>very</fex> frequent from the coastal plain to the mountains.
The meetings occurred at fortnightly <fex>intervals</fex>.
You have to renew the license every <fex>year</fex> .
The state government spends its fiscal year 2006 budget of $23.4 billion at a rate <fex>of $742 per second</fex>.
It costs about US$2.50 to travel 200km (124 mi), but <fex>buses</fex> are infrequent and only one or two buses a day service most routes.
These exposures were likely to be intermittent <fex>in frequency</fex> occurring only when workers were participating in activities at these specific areas.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: The Lord of the Rings: Return of the King
the Quest for the Holy Grail
